run.name: [com.sap.mi.fwk.ui.test.suites.MiFwkUiTestsCentral|UI] Basic Infrastructure (UI). UI tests command handling, connection handling, inconsistency handling, dc wizard, rapair dc actions, model editor management, marker handling, metamodel management, quickfixes, model clipboard, navigator tree support, standard handler and databinding
[com.sap.mi.fwk.ui.test.suites.MiFwkUiUnitTests|UI] Basic Infrastructure (UI). Unit tests for MOIN Data Binding and Tree Runtime API, including observable implementations and data binding context
